title: Bulb Founder steps down to embark on new battery venture
lead: Amit Gudka will remain on Bulb’s board and on the board of the Bulb Foundation

title: Texans see 300-fold rise in their energy bills after blackouts
lead: Energy suppliers pleaded to their customers to leave them as electricity prices skyrocketed

title: The powerful impact of collaborative procurement
lead: When Roadchef started its journey to find a new energy supplier, Co-op Power’s purchasing model delivered more than just money-saving assistance

title: More suppliers to bump up energy bills
lead: EDF dual-fuel customers will pay £1,138, an increase of £96

title: ‘Day of hope’: America officially rejoins Paris climate accord
lead: Joe Biden reversed the former President’s decision to withdraw from the treaty when he assumed office in January

title: Drivers to be paid £3,000 to give up their cars
lead: Drivers of diesel and petrol cars will reportedly be given ‘credits’ to spend on greener transport modes

title: Resident wins his bid to stop Vattenfall’s Norfolk wind farm
lead: High Court blocks Vattenfall’s 1.8GW Norfolk Vanguard offshore wind farm

title: ‘Super plant’ eats excessive polluted air
lead: Cotoneaster franchetii is at least 20% more effective at soaking up pollution, the Royal Horticultural Society says

title: EVs will outnumber diesel cars by 2030
lead: Number of petrol and diesel cars is predicted to see a drop of 16.6 million units by January 2030, new report suggests

title: SSEN procures 348MW of flexible energy service contracts
lead: That’s equivalent to the electricity needed to power around 91,000 homes
